description_text:
order SSN3980 hi i still need to get pedal plate because it was out of
stock in germany warehouse i would just like you to send me some info when
shipped last time i didnt get any tracking or anything when i
just received my pedals.

conversations.body_text: Hi Anze Novak,  We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Currently, our German warehouse has depleted its inventory of subflooring. We expect restocking on the 14th. At that time, we will ship your order via DHL.
